# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1131.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1131.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/incFile1 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/incFile1 ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/incFile2 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/incFile2 ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/incFile3 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/incFile3 ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/BUG_1131_SON/bug_1131.cir COMMAND Xyce bug_1131.cir )
set_property(TEST Certification_Tests/BUG_1131_SON/bug_1131.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly")
set_tests_properties(Certification_Tests/BUG_1131_SON/bug_1131.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug_1131.cir)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/BUG_1131_SON/bug_1131.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1131.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1131_SON/bug_1131.cir.prn bug_1131.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(Certification_Tests/BUG_1131_SON/bug_1131.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug_1131.cir)
